short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Look up German words on the YourDailyGerman dictionary.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A hand crafted German-English dictionary that gives you RELEVANT translations and usage notes. 

EDIT: Currently, the extension gives an error, if a word is NOT in the dictionary yet. We're working on exchanging that for similar search suggestions, like there are on YDG.
